title: Verbena & Lime Soy Candle
description:
Responsibly sourced soy candles with cotton wicks, fine fragrance and essential oils.
 

The herbaceous, zesty aroma of verbena, combines beautifully with fresh, fruity lime and notes of grapefruit and rosewood for a punchy aroma that awakens the senses. 

 

Top: Lemon, Grapefruit, Coconut, Mandarin

Middle: Verbena, Lime, Rosewood

Base: Cedarwood, Orris, Musk

title: Amber & Tonka Bean Soy Candle
description:
Responsibly sourced soy candles with cotton wicks, fine fragrance and essential oils.

 

A blend of exotic bergamot, grapefruit, cassis, orris, jasmine and orange blossom aromas, with sweet notes of lily, tonka, vanilla and praline on woody base notes of patchouli, cedarwood, musk and amber.

 

Top: Bergamot, Grapefruit, Cassis, Orris, Jasmine 

Middle: Tonka Bean, Lily, Vanilla, Burnt Praline

Base: Patchouli, Cedarwood, Amber, Musk

title: Moroccan Rose Soy Candle
description:
Responsibly sourced soy candles with cotton wicks, fine fragrance and essential oils.

 

An exotic, heady blend of rose buds, orange blossom and citrus top notes, with floral heart notes of geranium, patchouli, jasmine, lily and spice.  

 

Top: Rose buds, Orange Blossom, Grapefruit

Middle: Rose Geranium, Jasmine, Lily

Base: Sandalwood, Patchouli, Pink Peppercorn

title: English Pear & Spices Soy Candle
description:
Responsibly sourced soy candles with cotton wick, fine fragrance and essential oils.
 

Rich, fresh and sweet top notes of ripe pear and dessert wine, give way to subtle spicy undertones of cinnamon and nutmeg.

 

Top: Green Pear, Brown Sugar, Apple

Middle: Coconut, Cinnamon, Nutmeg

Base: Musk, Orange, Peppermint

title: Spa Recovery Soy Candle (Essential Oils)
description:
Responsibly sourced soy candles with cotton wicks and essential oils.

 

A revitalising blend of eucalyptus, peppermint, rosemary, orange, citronella, aniseed and thyme essential oils.

title: Spa Recovery Himalayan Bath Salt (With Essential Oils), Glass Bottle
description:
Sourced from the foothills of the Himlayas in Pakistan, these salts will add a spa-like quality to any bath or hot tub and can even be used as a rejuvenating foot soak. Containing 84 minerals including magnesium, calcium, phosphorus and iron (which gives the salt its unique pink colour) these salts will offer you a relaxing experience that can help replenish skin giving a natural glow.
 

We offer our Himalayan Salt infused with a delightful blend of essential oils. This revitalizing combination includes eucalyptus, peppermint, rosemary, orange, citronella, aniseed, and thyme essential oils.
